    • Constructor Detail

      • RunAnalysis

        public RunAnalysis(LocalThresholding thresholder,
                   java.lang.String srcFile,
                   java.lang.String destFile,
                   int gap1,
                   int gap2)
        Run analysis on folder
        Parameters:
        thresholder - custom thresholder; leave null if you want default
        srcFile - folder that contains all the AVIs to be processed
        destFile - csv file where you want the results to be written. WARNING: Overwrites anything in this file
        gap1 - gap between reference frame and first point.
        gap2 - gap between reference frame and second point.
